title: Maple syrup production in Canada 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Production in million gallons has rose over the Year.
Production in million gallons is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Production in million gallons, about 12.51 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Production in million gallons, of value 8.91 was reported at Year 2015
min_summary: Overall Production in million gallons has increased over the Year.
